title: Disconnect is penalizing me D:
body: keeps D/Cing me at champ loading, trying to reconnect after several minutes or logging back in lets me continue but then post completing the match, i get a leaver/afk penalty to where i dont get loot. just started getting this after small update. My connection is fine, it mostly happens on ARAM. dont know what to do and heard you get put on ban or low connect pool which i would like to avoid :(

replies.body: Leaverbuster shouldn't impact your ability to get loot restrictions, but getting marked as a leaver would result in a loss.  :(  The system will treat all disconnects and leaves equally among all players, so you may want to stick to customs for now and use our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  Let me know if you have any questions!
